title: Looking for players to play ranked team
body:
Looking for the following roles...

2 Jungle
1 Top
1 ADC
1 Mid

Must be min Bronze 1. we range from bronze 1 - plat 5 we playing for fun and you must be active to play team

replies.body: I would if they had ranked 5 queues open earlier. They could easily have them open from 4pm with minimal issues imo...

Hi I am actually as we speak on my B2 promos can I join if it is possible I am a serious player and I main mid, jg and top by the time you read this I will probably be almost B1 my ING is (ASH IS 1) thanks.
I'm bronze one on my other account. Does that count? I'm being serious. It's xxthatsbsxx. Can I join?
